医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
UTEP 研究人员推出了对抗白血病和淋巴瘤的有前景的新武器德克萨斯大学埃尔帕索分校的研究人员发现了一种新型药物化合物，可以成功杀死白血病和淋巴瘤癌细胞，可能为新的治疗形式铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UTEP-researchers-unveil-promising-new-weapon-against-leukemia-and-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UTEP-researchers-unveil-promising-new-weapon-against-leukemia-and-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a85a9859-db2e-4eb4-a56f-9af14a95dec2 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:06:58 -0500 UTEP researchers unveil promising new weapon against leukemia and lymphoma
突破性研究发现数百种与胰岛素抵抗相关的遗传标记一项针对 402,398 人的全基因组研究确定了 369 个与胰岛素抵抗相关的 SNP，为代谢疾病和潜在治疗靶点提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Groundwriting-study-uncovers-hundreds-of-genic-markers-linked-to-insulin-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Groundwriting-study-uncovers-hundreds-of-genic-markers-linked-to-insulin-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ad50ae5-2b7e-46b6-9d0f-30c4f4b5813f Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:03:00 -0500 Groundbreaking study uncovers hundreds of genetic markers linked to insulin resistance
为罕见的甲状腺髓样癌开发的有前景的 PET 扫描仪工具根据《核医学杂志》一月号发表的研究，在临床前和临床研究中发现一种新开发的 PET 显像剂可有效识别甲状腺髓样癌 (MTC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Promising-PET-scanner-tool-development-for-rare-medullary-tropical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Promising-PET-scanner-tool-development-for-rare-medullary-tropical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=085b36eb-07fe-41cb-858c-2f87a967d584 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:48:34 -0500 Promising PET scanner tool developed for rare medullary thyroid cancer
研究表明医护人员对 SARS-CoV-2 变异体具有持久的 T 细胞免疫力研究表明，在 Omicron 治疗后 1.5 年内，医护人员对 SARS-CoV-2 的记忆 T 细胞产生了强烈的反应，这表明对高度突变的变异体具有持久的免疫力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Study-shows- permanent-T-cell-immunity-in-healthcare-workers-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Study-shows- permanent-T-cell-immunity-in-healthcare-workers-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73c29dfd-c762-41a6-a658-c2335e751ff8 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:47:00 -0500 Study shows lasting T-cell immunity in healthcare workers against SARS-CoV-2 variants
CZI 资助支持疾病传播中旁观细胞的突破性研究研究人员在接受抗菌治疗后检查旁观细胞的疾病感染情况，这些细胞靠近受感染的细胞，但本身并未受到感染，并从陈·扎克伯格倡议中获得了近 50 万美元的资助，以推进他们的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/CZI-grant-backs-groundwriting-research-on-bystander-cells-in-disease-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/CZI-grant-backs-groundwriting-research-on-bystander-cells-in-disease-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=417d8307-6548-4961-bc1c-8aa7963c8094 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:11:25 -0500 CZI grant backs groundbreaking research on bystander cells in disease spread
突破性药物为危及生命的心脏病带来新希望伦敦大学学院和皇家自由医院的研究人员开发出一种突破性的保护心脏的新药，被诊断患有危及生命的心脏病的人们获得了新的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Groundwriting-drug-offers-new-hope-for-life-throne-heart-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Groundwriting-drug-offers-new-hope-for-life-throne-heart-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ed68fb8-fea2-4a5d-8a2b-df2f38ce16c8 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:08:12 -0500 Groundbreaking drug offers new hope for life-threatening heart condition
新分子靶向自身免疫性疾病的关键蛋白斯克里普斯研究中心的科学家开发了一种小分子，可以阻断与自身免疫性疾病相关的蛋白质的活性，包括系统性红斑狼疮 (SLE) 和克罗恩病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/New-molecule-targets-key- Protein-in-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/New-molecule-targets-key- Protein-in-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61fed8da-405f-451f-8093-be63ae05fdd7 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:02:47 -0500 New molecule targets key protein in autoimmune diseases
研究揭示了受损的自噬如何在导致心力衰竭中发挥作用一项新的研究揭示了自噬（人体清除受损细胞部分的过程）在受损时如何在导致心力衰竭中发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Study-sheds-light-on-how-impaired-autophagy-can-play-a-role-in-causing-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Study-sheds-light-on-how-impaired-autophagy-can-play-a-role-in-causing-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61c8748e-6380-45c0-9839-f61604f1a8e3 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 21:39:31 -0500 Study sheds light on how impaired autophagy can play a role in causing heart failure
前往接受治疗：三分之一的 NHS 乳腺癌患者绕过当地中心最新研究表明，当选择在哪里接受手术治疗时，近三分之一通过英格兰国家医疗服务体系 (NHS) 接受治疗的乳腺癌患者选择绕过最近的中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Traveling-for-treatment-One-third-of-NHS-breast-cancer-病人-bypass-local-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Traveling-for-treatment-One-third-of-NHS-breast-cancer-患者-bypass-local-center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcf40784-4618-461c-a80e-aaf49fc819ec Thu, 11 Jan 2024 20:06:00 -0500 Traveling for treatment: One-third of NHS breast cancer patients bypass local center
英国孕产妇死亡率创20年来新高MBRRACE-UK 合作调查英国孕产妇死亡的最新数据显示，怀孕期间或怀孕后不久死亡的妇女死亡率已上升至 2003 年 5 月以来的最高水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UKs-maternal-mortality-rate-hits-20-year-high.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UKs-maternal-mortality-rate-hits-20-year-high.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64928516-f112-41ba-8f57-9add605c1340 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 20:00:43 -0500 UK's maternal mortality rate hits 20-year high
